price: 39. Nabiyow ken meesis nadaamah ayroy (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) caagid meklimay ginô fan baxsaanaah moominiiniy jannat cultaa kee korosuy gira culta yakken waqdi, usun (koros kinnuk) asaaku addunyal ken как meesiiseenimik garcit anuk usun rabak lakal ugut yaniih mano tanim manummaysan.
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
